core_meaning.legge_1899_public_domain: Pure creative force: great, originating, penetrating, correct, and firmly persevering. This hexagram describes the primal, initiating power that establishes order.
core_meaning.normalized_summary: Sovereign creative will. The force that initiates reality, aligned with disciplined correctness rather than ego.

translations.text: The dragon lies hid in the deep; it is not the time for active doing.
潜龙勿用 (Qián lóng wù yòng)

lines.normalized_meaning: Power exists but remains intentionally concealed. Acting now would be premature.

translations.text: The dragon appears in the field. It will be advantageous to see the great man.
见龙在田，利见大人 (Jiàn lóng zài tián, lì jiàn dà rén)

lines.normalized_meaning: Creative force is emerging into visibility. Align yourself with wise leadership / high-caliber alliance.

translations.text: Active all the day, the superior man is ever vigilant at night. There is danger, but no blame.
君子终日乾乾，夕惕若，厉无咎 (Jūn zǐ zhōng rì qián qián, xī tì ruò, lì wú jiù)

lines.normalized_meaning: Relentless drive, intense vigilance. You're pushing hard and you know the stakes. It's tiring but still correct.

translations.text: He seems to be leaping up, but is still in the deep; there will be no error.
或跃在渊，无咎 (Huò yuè zài yuān, wú jiù)

lines.normalized_meaning: You're coiled and ready to launch, but you're technically still below the surface. Holding tension a little longer is wise.

translations.text: The dragon is flying in the sky; it will be advantageous to see the great man.
飞龙在天，利见大人 (Fēi lóng zài tiān, lì jiàn dà rén)

lines.normalized_meaning: Full ascendancy. Legitimate authority. Lead visibly and responsibly.

translations.text: The arrogant dragon will have cause to repent.
亢龙有悔 (Kàng lóng yǒu huǐ)

lines.normalized_meaning: Overextension and pride cause downfall. Power without humility collapses.
